subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
College Athletics
Basketball
Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Thanks to a flurry of foul calls at the end of the game, No. 8 Butler managed to outlast the No. 1 Panthers on a Matt Howard free throw with .8 of a second remaining.
snippet: Thanks to a flurry of foul calls at the end of the game, No. 8 Butler managed to outlast the No. 1 Panthers on a Matt Howard free throw with .8 of a second remaining.
